info.title: Safety-Related Properties
info.description: This service writes data that is provided by an external application to the safety-related properties in the Product Compliance solution in SAP S/4HANA Cloud. It uses the provided data to create or update a version of the safety-related properties. In addition, the service can also read data of the safety-related properties and provides this data to an external application.

x-sap-shortText: Create and update safety-related properties and read safety-related property data using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Chemical Compliance Approval for Purchased Material and Supplier(31G)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31G " Link To BP ")
[Assess Marketability of a Product(31H)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/31H " Link To BP ")
[Assess Dangerous Goods for a Product(3FC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3FC " Link To BP ")
[Manage Safety Data Sheets for Products(3VR)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3VR " Link To BP ")
[Request Regulatory Documentation from Service Provider(6AV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6AV " Link To BP ")

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET SafetyRelatedProperty HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
